ul.li: From version 8.4.0 onwards, you have an option to input the Applitools server URL to integrate with Katalon Studio.

li.p: For version 8.5.5 onwards and version before 7.6.0, you need to install this plugin from Katalon Store: Applitools Integration.
From version 7.6.0 to 8.5.2, Applitools Integration is a built-in Katalon Studio Enterprise feature.
